title: Vaio E Series Ryzen 5 Quad Core 3500U - (8 GB/512 GB SSD/Windows 10 Home) NE15V2IN007P Thin and Light Laptop  (15.6 inch, Silver, 1.77 kg, With MS Office)

product_specification.Sales Package: Laptop, Power Adaptor, Laptop Bag, User Guide, Warranty Documents
product_specification.Clock Speed: 2.1 GHz with Turbo Boost Upto 3.7 GHz
product_specification.USB Port: 2 x USB 3.0, 1 x USB 3.1 Type C (PD 3.0 Charging, Display Out)
product_specification.Screen Type: Full HD LED Backlit IPS Display

product_description.Stylish and Elegant Design: Featuring a stylish and stunning design, this laptop from Vaio is a must-buy device that perfectly complements a modern corporate leader’s lifestyle.
product_description.Lightweight: Thanks to its lightweight build, this laptop makes it easy to lift, hold, and open. You can even take it along with you wherever you go, making it your ideal travel companion.
product_description.Easy Connectivity: This laptop comes with a wide range of I/O ports that let you connect various compatible devices to it. Moreover, the ports are placed on either side of the laptop, making it easy for you to connect your compatible mobile/tablet, storage drives, external displays, and more.
product_description.Stunning Audio-visual Experience: Get ready to enjoy an immersive and cinematic audio-visual experience as this laptop comes with a 39.62 cm (15.6) Full HD IPS screen and dual speakers. This laptop’s screen offers clear and vivid visuals which makes every bit of content come alive. Moreover, its slim bezel offers a larger viewing area, making it a delight to binge-watch your favorite TV shows. The dual speakers deliver rich and high-fidelity audio, taking your movie-watching experience to another level.
product_description.Long-lasting Battery: This laptop’s battery can offer a runtime of up to 8 hours when fully charged, helping you finish your tasks on time. Along with giving final touches to your presentation, you can even watch one or more episodes of your favorite TV show before the device needs to be plugged in to be charged.
product_description.Ergonomic Keyboard and Hinge: Thanks to the ergonomically designed hinge, this laptop's screen tilts down at a slanting angle, enabling you to open it with ease. The keyboard offers a comfortable typing experience, thereby minimizing the load on your hands while working.
product_description.SSD: Store your files, photos, videos, and more in a single place as this Vaio E15 laptop comes with a large-capacity SSD. This SSD also helps in enhancing the performance of this laptop, making it a delight to play games or work on it.

review:
Fabulous design, premium matte finish, looks awesome
Build quality is good, plastic but solid built
Fast processor and ssd makes operating smooth
Display is good ..
Supports all gestures
Battery 6-7 hrs
Normal heating ...
Justifies the price overall good for medium user

CONS
camera not that good

The laptop looks good overall - Thin bezel, ag ips display and the slightly slanted keyboard, got a very good laptop bag.
Found some issues with the laptop -
Fan noise is too loud when the speed goes high, and heat is getting blown on to the bottom side of the screen. Dont know if this is a good idea in the long run.
Office subscription is only for 1 year ** its office personal not h and s, but you get extra apps like onedrive, onenote etc.
The laptop speaker sound quality isnt that great. Its having decent loudness though.
screen brightness is not that great.
Only 2 usb ports provided.

Laptop has Matt Looks and design is very decent
Overall a good deal. This is only the first day review, everything found excellent except some heat at the battery side. Will try to elaborate more after using it for a week.

It has been now more than a week and now I am decreasing one star as it really heats at the back and yes there is a little sound of Fan's noise as well.
Rest the laptop is really fast and happening.
Overall it's ok till now.

Let's see further.

Thin and light, the overall form factor of the laptop describe being 15.6 size is a bit smaller. The display is quite enough with good viewing angles and better than most HP/DELL Laptops is this range. The body is made of plastic but trust me it's amazing. I use this laptop for meetings/office work/surfing/movies. Ryzen 3500u is good enough to handle this kind of usage and in this form factor makes it a good deal. Right side numeric keypad is an added benefit for users!

First look is impressive, very thin and lightweight, Dispaly is bright and good, superfast performance with windows 10 and SSD with 8 gb of ram, Reason of 4 star is I found some heating on the back, It is quite acceptable for me as I'm normal user, but not sure it is temporary or permanent, One more thing is it has inbuilt battery so you can't remove it, Overall good performance and worthy product.
Great laptop.... Black variant is looking like a cheaper one.. but great performance. Average camera..

Yeah I've used 3days . I felt little bit heat under the laptop. But it's ok when we use on table it won't heat if we place it on bed it will get heat. Charging by closing the laptop it will take 1.20 min to charge 0 to 85
Pros:
*Price..I think won't get better deal than this.
*8GB ram , 512 ssd ,40 wt fast charging, ryzen 5 quad core
*Disply ok for me.
*Sound good
*Windows 10
*Discharging time 5hours for me
*Looks premium but it's semi plastic
Cons:
*Getting little bit heat . But its common in amd ryzen processor.
*Camera only 1mp
[Ryzen 5 quad core is better than i5 and less than i7]
Overall (7.5/10)
Go for this.

Excellent Laptop by Vaio
Display is very good with thin bezzels.
Processor is very fast, it takes just 5-6 seconds to start the pc
Laptop bag given with laptop is of nice fabric quality
Overall highly satified with the product
Super laptop with great performance, look supub and premium. as a IT guy I must recommend to all this lappy.

This is my detail review of my laptop
1) performance is excellent as expected than other laptop very smooth very handy and super duper fast.
2) ips display is simply amazing no doubt
3) It's okay battery lacks in between and yes their is a slightly noise of fan and heating is also fine.o Otherwise its very ease to guys I would strongly recommend go for this product.
Only for office or personal use not at al gaming.
Thanks you flipkart for delivering the product very properly .
Thank you flipkart team and management for taking the responsibility In such a sistematic way.

Excellent product in the range of 45-50k. Looks are premium, display was decent and good enough as compared to other laptops in this budget range. It was mentioned that it contains office but the truth is it gives an office 365 subscription for one year after which we need to renew (drawback). Sound quality was not up to the expectations, it is not that loud enough which we can get from the competitors. It delivers an exceptional performance with fast booting time and can run all the applications smoothly.

I would recommend this product for students/ working professional as it is good for running applications like MATALAB, CAD Softwares and other office applications including gaming

I have been searching for a laptop from few days and I finally decided to go for VAIO e15 . First thanks to flipkart for fast delivery.It has a great display, booting was very fast because of the AMD ryzen 5, decent battery back up 4 to 5 hours depending on our usage , body made up of plastic but looks premium and backlit keyboard was good. Speakers volume could have been better.
After 5 months I've observed no major issues so far but it's heating while browsing and some light editing.

Good Performance. Booting time less than 30 seconds. very fast. In built MS Office 365. In first boot don't connect to internet, other wise the system will automatically download latst Win 10 update, whch will take more than 90 minutes.
A fantastic laptop bought it for my daughter and she has very much inspired to this beautiful kid. Thank you Flipkart and thanks to SONY VAIO!
Good in speed very nice to handle but battery performance little bit low compare to which i expected more over everything is good like a premium laptop display is awesome in vaio..

Very good and smooth functioning laptop. Even my friends and relatives are impressed very much and some of them are planning to buy it. Battery backup is upto four hours while online usage and the same works more than five hours offline. Thanks alot Vaio team and Flipkart.

I'm writing this review after 5 months of usage.

Vaio is a well known brand. I usually check all the specifications before I buy any gadget. It works amazingly fast and smooth.. No doubt about that. These are my classifications based on my usage.

For students : It's the best in the range. It has all the specifications we need to do daily tasks by the students.
For Coders : Yes, It is good. As a SE, I'm using this laptop for the past 6 months and It did a great job for me.
For Creators : It is not much recommended as it has comparatively does low in RAM and Graphics card.

8gb RAM and 512 SSD is far more enough for students and coders for sure

Coming to processor, It has very good processor names AMD Ryzen 5 3500u which is good in handling multiple cores.
PS: It has some heating issue while charging.(But improper earthing could be the reason for it (In my case it is not heating once I resolved earthing issue)
Note : It is Polycarbonate body. Do not expect to be tough and rigid. In fact, it feels delicate on the first touch.

This laptop is not recommended for rough users.
Thank you.... :)

After one week laptop display issue 2 line coming from display and report to customer service and good support to change display after one week but repair agency roughly use laptop and lots of scratches in front area so laptop look like 2nd hand laptop so I recommend to don't waste buy this laptop because my laptop after repair look like second hand laptop ,so I think why I am buy this viao laptop ..

After one week my experience says...
Looks and display- 5star
Battery drains too fast however gives around 4 hr backup
Working on Microsoft office is a big challenge. It's not activating on laptop even after many tries and login through paid membership as well though it was. Microsoft product key doesn't comes automatically as suggested by Vaio.
Sound ia too low , have to use portable Bluetooth speaker for online classes.
Overall a 3 star as I am still using it for browsing and mail purpose only.

It's a good laptop. But the keyboard keys are very light & loose. It can break easily. Also, there are no enough ports in this laptop. The charger provided is also missing Vaio branding, which means it's a local Chinese charger.

Else, the performance is decent for day to day activities. Boot is fast due to SSD.
Super laptop value for money laptop bag also super
Beautiful looking. Backlit keyboard. Built solid. Also got a beautiful laptop cloth bag. worth it.
It's really a good product
Premium quality

Aswame product
Picture quality is very very awesome
Display quality beetter tan all
Premium looking
Nice

Excellent for daily use
It's fast, efficient and good looking.
Display is brilliant
Battery lasts about 4+ hours if ms office or chrome browsing is done.
The only problem is heating, it's slightly high when compared to other laptops.

Everything is fine, except some issues with Wifi hardware. Still facing issue with the wifi. Initially system was not detecting the hardware for wifi. Now It got disconnected very frequently even with a good network strength. Also troubles when we try to connect with a new network.
Compact design, soothing keypad and mouse board. Fast response as per cost and expectation. Microsoft office 365 valid for 1 year. Unfortunately the fan speed to too high to tolerate!
Today i received this laptop. Packing is so good and flipkart take care of safety during packing.
First of all This laptop is value for money and its good to use for office purpose and if you are game addict try some other laptop

The laptop is great I'm happy to use this.
It's really awesome to see the logo design and over all performance is awesome. Go for it you won't regret it after buying 🙂

I am reviewing this laptop after using around 5 months (light use only). This laptop has stunning design and display. Boot time is very less, the moment you switch on the laptop you will be in your login screen, thanks to AMD for that. Good clarity while watching movies and all. Green color light in power on/off button light is a bit annoying when use in dark esp., watching movies. Battery backup is a bit poor and also heating issue is there (can't use by lap for long time).
Excellent design and light weight, booting also good. Overall nice ... Thanks to VAIO

Was excited to see the product while unboxing. During initial setup, laptop was not connecting to wifi and I had to set it up via without internet option where you don't get most of the apps installed. However next day the laptop was receiving wifi signal and I had to do windows reset to begin the setup process afresh.

I noticed heating issue which I also read in reviews by others. Thus I assume its a common issue in Vaio.

Design is elegant and I liked the slanting position of keypads when it is placed on the desk. However when it is placed on lap, it bothers you due to that extra projection at the bottom of the laptop which is intended to give a slanting position for keypads. Display is awesome.

I haven't used the laptop for long hours, hence I am not sure about the battery performance. I have Lenovo laptop with same configuration and I was curious to perform speed test for comparison. I noticed the speed is almost same in both the laptops.
Nice 👍👍

The worst laptop ever. I purchased this in Jan 2021 under the impression that this is the Vaio under Sony, which was a great laptop. This Vaio is owned by Nextgo & service by Avita. Except, for the looks, there is nothing good about this laptop. In less than a year, I have faced keyboard, display, webcam, sound and heating issues. The keyboard even got replaced but every day there is a new problem and the worst part of this laptop is terrible after sales service. Also there is no option to sell this laptop in exchange, I am stuck with this horrible product. Please do not buy this Vaio laptop, especially the amd ryzen one, you will only regret like me.

pros.Design: Features a stylish and stunning design and is super light making it easy to carry anywhere.
pros.Performance: The AMD Ryzen 5 Quad core processor gives a super-fast and seamless performance.
pros.512 GB SSD: The booting time is very less due to the presence of 512GB SSD.
pros.39.62 cm (15.6 inch) 1920 x 1080 Pixel F: The display offers clear and vivid visuals and are simply amazing.

cons.Sound: Sound quality is average. Speakers could have been better.
cons.Li-ion Battery: Battery backup could have been better. It is decent enough but not good at this price range.

summary.verdict: The Vaio E Series Ryzen 5 Quad Core 3500U laptop is a good pick especially for students and programmers.
summary.Additional Information: RAM non-expandable, Heating issues, Backlight Keyboard.
